aboutSection.title: Sobre mi
aboutSection.technical_profile: Titulada técnica en Mecatrónica Industrial y estudiante de Ingeniería de Software con experiencia práctica en IoT, sistemas embebidos, telemetría industrial y análisis de datos. He trabajado con RTLS, protocolos industriales y pipelines de adquisición de data, dashboards, and prototipos de hardware conectados.
aboutSection.CTA: Si estás buscando a alguien que combine hardware, software, y data en sistemas reales, estás en lugar correcto, espero jaja
aboutSection.aboutMe: My discipline was shaped through years of taekwondo training and competition. I also built a solid artistic background as part of the Youth Choir of Sinfonía por el Perú, performing and touring in Europe, including an international competition in Vienna. I’ve consistently taken part in high-performance extracurriculars, leadership roles, and selective academic programs. This trajectory defines how I work: consistency, rigorous training, focus, and the ability to adapt quickly to demanding environments.

keyAchievements.title: Logros clave
keyAchievements.achievement1: 11vo lugar a nivel nacional y 1er lugar a nivel departamental en el concurso de innovación SENATI Innova 2025.
keyAchievements.achievement2: YOUNGA Delegada en el YOUNGA Global Festival 2023-2024, BridgingTheGap Ventures y graduada del programa Aspire Leadership.
keyAchievements.achievement3: Becaria de la beca Laureate Transforma, para estudiar Ingeniería de Software en la Universidad Peruana de Ciencias Aplicadas (UPC).
keyAchievements.achievement4: 3er lugar a nivel nadcional en el Concurso Nacional de propuestas para el Desarrollo Sostenible del programa Academia de Líderes UNI-ONU 2023 de la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería y el sistema de las Naciones Unidas en Perú.
keyAchievements.achievement5: Representante de Perú como parte del coro juvenil central de Sinfonia por el Perú en el concurso internacional de coros en Vienna, Austria, así como en las giras internacionales en Suiza 2019, Chile 2023 y Austria 2024.
keyAchievements.achievement6: Ponente en el congreso de mujeres líderes She Leads organizado por el capítulo IEEE WIE UPC y en el I Congreso de Emprendimiento e Innovación organizado por la Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos.
keyAchievements.achievement7: Casi 10 años de entrenamiento de Taekwondo ITF, alcanzando el grado de Cinturón negro 3er Dan y múltiples medallas departamentales y nacionales.
keyAchievements.achievement8: Reconocimiento por el Departamento de Confiabilidad de Ferreyros S.A.

aboutSection.availability: Disponible actualmente para trabajos freelance u horarios de tiempo completo ya sean híbridos o remotos globalmente, o híbridos/remotos/presenciales en Lima, Perú.

autViam.title: Una frase
autViam.quote: Aut viam inveniam aut faciam. - Hannibal Barca
autViam.translation: Encontraré un camino o lo crearé. - Aníbal Barca

mindset.description: My professional growth has been guided by the idea that there is always a solution, even when it's not obvious. I come from a background where opportunities are not guaranteed, so I turned every challenge into a driving force. This mentality allowed me to pave my way through two careers, earn competitive scholarships, and advance in technical areas with steep learning curves. This same attitude is what I bring to every project: researching, testing, iterating, and not letting go of the problem until I find the answer.

projectsSection.title: My Projects
projectsSection.description: A tactical gallery of past work — click a card to inspect the full dossier

senatiInnova.name: Acquisition and Visualization of Data from Mechatronic Module 4.0 with Augmented Reality
senatiInnova.description: Monitoring and data acquisition system prototype for SENATI Innovation National Contest
senatiInnova.challenge: 24-hour limit for the prototype development and presentation.
achievements: 11th place at National Level
1st place at departmental level

PLC.title: Siemens PLC Data Adquisition
PLC.description: Use S7 Node-RED library to read data from Siemens S7-1200 PLC via Ethernet.

MQTT.title: MQTT-NodeRED Flow
MQTT.description: Configured HiveMQ MQTT broker to facilitate communication between the PLC and data visualization platforms.

UnityApp.title: Unity App
UnityApp.description: Developed an Augmented Reality application using Unity and Vuforia to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0 on mobile devices. Additional feautes include sensors and acuators datasheets and 3D CAD models visualization.

UnityApp3d.title: Sensors and Actuators 3D Models Visualization
UnityApp3d.description: Developed an Augmented Reality application using Unity and Vuforia to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0 on mobile devices. Additional feautes include sensors and acuators datasheets and 3D CAD models visualization.

UnityAppDatasheet.title: Sensors and Actuators Datasheet Visualization
UnityAppDatasheet.description: Developed an Augmented Reality application using Unity and Vuforia to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0 on mobile devices. Additional feautes include sensors and acuators datasheets and 3D CAD models visualization.

UnityAppRTData.title: Real-Time Data Visualization
UnityAppRTData.description: Developed an Augmented Reality application using Unity and Vuforia to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0 on mobile devices. Additional feautes include sensors and acuators datasheets and 3D CAD models visualization.

Dashboard.title: ThingsBoard Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Created a dashboard using ThingsBoard to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0.

GoogleSheets.title: Google Sheets Data Logging
GoogleSheets.description: Implemented a Node-RED Google Sheets node to log data into Google Sheets for historical analysis. Stored values include Air Flow, Product Quantity, current production, total flow, voltage levels, current levels, power, and ON/OFF state of capacitive sensor.

RTLS.name: Real Time Localization System (RTLS)
RTLS.description: A RTLS system for tracking assets in real-time using BLE technology.
RTLS.challenge: Develop a reliable RTLS system that can accurately track the location of assets within a defined area.
achievements: Successfully implemented a BLE-based RTLS system.
Developed firmware for ESP32 devices to communicate with BLE beacons.
Created a Node-RED flow to process and visualize location data.
RTLS.emailPrompt: Input a valid email to unlock the pdf

reverseEngineering.name: Hydraulic Bench Reverse Engineering Process
reverseEngineering.description: Project aimed to use telemetry and supervision to keep a history of the Hydraulic bench.
reverseEngineering.problem: We have two hydraulic benches and both use legacy protocols and there is barely no documentation
reverseEngineering.challenge: Reverse engineer the communication protocols used by the hydraulic bench to extract telemetry data.
steps: Capture communication data using Wireshark.
Analyze the captured data to identify protocols and data structures.
Develop Python scripts to extract and process telemetry data.
Implement a supervision system to monitor and log hydraulic bench performance.

linealTransformers.name: Lineal Transformers
linealTransformers.description: Web platform created to ease the learning of lineal transformers for engineering students in Math asignatures. Developed as Final project for the Discrete Mathematics Course.
linealTransformers.challenge: Create an interactive web platform that simplifies the understanding of lineal transformers for engineering students.
achievements: Developed an interactive web platform with visualizations and examples.
Implemented user-friendly features to enhance the learning experience.
Received positive feedback from students and educators.
steps: Design the web platform layout and user interface.
Develop interactive features and visualizations using JavaScript.
Test the platform with engineering students and gather feedback.
Refine the platform based on user feedback to improve usability.

TinkuyhubJuntta.name: Tinkuyhub & Juntta Platforms Integration
TinkuyhubJuntta.description: HTTPS integration of Tinkuyhub & Juntta platforms to create an account for both Tinkuyhub and Juntta in Tinkuyhub website.
TinkuyhubJuntta.challenge: Reduce the friction in the signup process by integrating both platforms for a seamless user experience.
achievements: Successfully designed and developed an e-commerce platform.
Implemented secure payment processing and order management features.
Optimized the platform for performance and user experience.
steps: Design the e-commerce platform layout and user interface.
Develop frontend features using React.
Implement backend functionalities with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Integrate secure payment processing and order management systems.

theCvGen.name: The CV Gen
theCvGen.description: The CV Gen is an AI-powered web application that generates professional resumes based on user input. It leverages advanced language models to create tailored CVs that highlight the user's skills, experience, and achievements effectively.
theCvGen.problem: Creating a well-structured and professional resume can be challenging for many individuals, especially those with limited experience in resume writing.
theCvGen.challenge: Develop an intuitive web application that utilizes AI to generate high-quality resumes quickly and easily.
achievements: Successfully developed a user-friendly web application using Next.js.
Integrated OpenAI's language model to generate personalized resumes.
Implemented a seamless user interface for easy input and resume generation.
steps: Design the web application layout and user interface using Next.js and React.
Integrate OpenAI's API to enable AI-driven resume generation.
Implement features for user input and customization of resumes.
Test the application for usability and performance, making improvements as needed.

servicesSection.title: Services
servicesSection.tagline: Offering a range of services to help you achieve your goals.
servicesSection.sideTitle: What can I do for you
servicesSection.sideText: I offer the services listed here to satisfy for techie needs.
servicesSection.littlesideText1: Need it faster? For an additional premium, project completion times can be accelerated to meet your urgent deadlines.
servicesSection.littlesideText2: Offering high-quality solutions with rates designed to be accessible, ensuring great value for your investment.
servicesSection.littlesideText3: Every project is custom-tailored to your unique needs, ensuring a highly specialized and results-driven outcome.

webdevelopment.name: Web Development
webdevelopment.description: Custom, high-performance web applications built using React, Next.js, Node.js, and REST APIs. Includes responsive UI, backend development, automation workflows, and dashboard creation.

caddesign.name: CAD Design
caddesign.description: 2D/3D CAD modeling for mechanical components, enclosures, product concepts, and engineering documentation. Suitable for manufacturing and R&D.

aiavatars.name: AI Avatars
aiavatars.description: Creation of AI-driven avatars with NLP, speech synthesis, and real-time interaction. Ideal for customer service, branding, education, and interactive applications.

iotdevelopment.name: IoT Development
iotdevelopment.description: End-to-end IoT solutions including embedded firmware (ESP32), BLE scanning, MQTT pipelines, sensor integration, and real-time device dashboards.

embeddedprototyping.name: Hardware & Embedded Prototyping
embeddedprototyping.description: Development of functional prototypes using sensors, microcontrollers, wireless modules, and custom electronics. Suitable for proof-of-concept and MVPs.

telemetrysystems.name: Telemetry & Data Acquisition Systems
telemetrysystems.description: Integration of sensors, BLE beacons, MQTT telemetry, cloud dashboards, and data collection pipelines for real-time monitoring.

dataengineering.name: Data Engineering & Analytics
dataengineering.description: ETL pipelines, data cleaning, Looker Studio dashboards, BigQuery queries, and actionable reporting for business or industrial data.

reverseengineering.name: Reverse Engineering (Non-Sensitive Systems)
reverseengineering.description: Protocol analysis, firmware exploration, device mapping, Wireshark packet inspection, and compatibility research.

automation.name: Process Automation
automation.description: Automation scripts, bots, and workflow tools using Python, JavaScript, and APIs. Ideal for reducing repetitive tasks and optimizing operations.

aichatbot.name: AI Chatbot Development
aichatbot.description: Custom AI chatbots using GPT-4 and other language models for customer support, lead generation, and user engagement.
